thread.title: Arsenal transfer news: Man City ace Jadon Sancho wanted by Gunners | Metro News
thread.title_full: Arsenal transfer news: Man City ace Jadon Sancho wanted by Gunners | Metro News

author: Tom Olver For Metro.Co.Uk
title: Arsenal transfer news: Man City ace Jadon Sancho wanted by Gunners | Metro News
text:
Arsenal lining up transfer move for Manchester City starlet Jadon Sancho gossip Tom Olver for Metro.co.uk Sunday 26 Feb 2017 10:10 am Can Arsene Wenger lure Jadon Sancho to Arsenal? (Picture: Getty) 
Arsenal are interested in signing Manchester City youngster Jadon Sancho, according to reports. Jurgen Klopp sends warning to his Liverpool flops after Leicester loss 
Sancho moved from Watford to the Etihad in a £500,000 deal back in 2015 but the 17-year-old forward is yet to make an appearance for City’s first-team. 
The Sun suggest Arsenal’s top scout Steve Rowley has been closely monitoring the England Under-17 international and the Gunners are now keen on bringing him to north London. 
It’s understood the attraction of London could be enough to lure the highly-rated teenager to the Emirates. Pep Guardiola may lose one of Man City’s top talents (Picture: Getty) 
Sancho, who currently turns out for City’s U18 side, has trained under Pep Guardiola this season but the ex-Barcelona boss could be about to lose one of the most promising youngsters at the club. 
Impressively, the right-footed striker has managed five goals in six appearances for England’s U17s.
